Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
name: dfm
summary: A dotfile manager for lazy people and pair programmers. Dotfile Manager will allow you to create "profiles" for dotfiles underneath one unix account and easily switch between them. It requires a git repo with your dotfiles in it and that the dotfiles be placed how you want them represented in your home directory.
